Setting.Label: Splits during progression points of the game
Scavenger's Den
Setting.ToolTip: Complete the climbing QTE at the end of the intro.

Setting.Label: Coastal Bluffs
Setting.ToolTip: Lara reaches the area where the bow is.

Setting.Label: Collect the Bow
Setting.ToolTip: Lara gets the bow.

Setting.Label: Coastal Forest (South)
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when Lara climbs the ladder of the bunker.

Setting.Label: Coastal Forest (North)
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after the cutscene of Lara getting captured after Whitman Skip.

Setting.Label: Mountain Temple
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after ascending the narrow mountain shaft, before reuniting with Roth for the first time.

Setting.Label: Wolves
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after you skip the 2nd cutscene with Roth after retriving the pack from the wolves

Setting.Label: Bridge
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after you get past the collapsing bridge

Setting.Label: Mountain Village
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after you current location updates to Base approach

Setting.Label: Base Approach
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after lara lands in the water

Setting.Label: Mountain Base
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after exiting the Mountain Base into the snowy outside.

Setting.Label: Base Exterior
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after descending the communications tower and blowing up the fuel tanks.

Setting.Label: Cliffside Village
Setting.ToolTip: Splits in the tunnel before reuniting with Roth for the second time.

Setting.Label: Mountain Pass
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after sliding down the hill before raido call with Alex.

Setting.Label: Bell
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after bell cutscene

Setting.Label: Mountain Village 3
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when going down the zipline to get to waterfall before parachute

Setting.Label: Mountain Decent
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after falling from the collapsing monastary tunnel.

Setting.Label: Mountain Descent
Setting.ToolTip: Splits after completing the parachute QTE when entering the Shantytown.

Setting.Label: Shantytown (North)
Setting.ToolTip: Splits when Lara goes through the gate to the southern part of Shantytown.
